question: Raj and Ram working together do a piece of work in 10 days. Raj alone can do it in 12 days. Ram alone will do the work in :
explanation:
(Raj + Ram)\'s 1 day\'s work $latex = \\frac{1}{10}&s=1$
Raj\'s 1 day\'s work $latex = \\frac{1}{12}&s=1$
∴ Ram\'s 1 day\'s work $latex =\\frac{1}{10}-\\frac{1}{12} = \\frac{6-5}{60} = \\frac{1}{60}&s=1$
∴ Required Time = 60 days. 
Hence option [D] is correct answer.
